```{r}
here::i_am("grades.Rproj")
library(here)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
```

### Question 1

```{r}
cours <- read_csv(here("courses.csv"))
```

### Question 2

```{r}
cours %>% 
  arrange(course) %>% 
  rename(
    Course = course,
    `Course ID` = course_id,
    Trimester = trimester,
    `Number of Exams` = nb_grades
  ) %>% 
  kable() 
```

### Question 3

```{r}
student <- read_csv(here("students.csv"))

```

```{r}
spec(student)
```

```{r}
col_types = cols(
    id = col_integer(),
    group = col_factor(),
    birth_date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
    sex = col_factor()
  )

```

The `birth_date` column of the students data frame is of class `r class(student$birth_date)`
.
